r.s: Engine for performing and rendering text diffs
r.d: This package provides a text-based diff engine and renderers for multiple diff output formats.
r.n: * Converted to package.xml 2.0. * Added context diff renderer. * Stripped nul characters to avoid infinite loops (PEAR bug #7921). * Fix assertion with PHP 5 (PEAR bug #10423). * Add shell diff engine (PEAR bug #12051).
